title: "University of Chicago researchers seek to “poison” AI art generators with Nightshade"
excerpt: "On Friday, a team of researchers at the University of Chicago released a research paper outlining \"Nightshade,\" a data poisoning technique aimed at disrupting the training process for AI models, reports MIT Technology Review and VentureBeat."
